inclusion.criterion: Concurrent urological disease requiring surgery which includes cystoscopy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No history of recurrent urinary infections (more than two infections in previous year)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Has not passed a renal tract stone
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Require VCMG as part of their clinical care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A prior diagnosis of dysfunctional voiding
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have either: Symptoms of stress urinary incontinence Or urinary incontinence with a neuropathic bladder Require VCMG as part of their clinical care.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unaccompanied by adult with parental responsibility who can give consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous bladder outlet or urethral surgery
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs and neurogenic bladder, but meets several inclusion criteria. Exclusion criterion for previous bladder outlet or urethral surgery is met.
